comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Why all the American Stars'n'Stripes flags if it is Federation?

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] You had me thinking for a moment that it could be to do with the visit of the American fleet to Sydney in 1908, but now I'm sure its just a decorative contribution of the Americans to the Federation celebrations. Here's another Federation photo showing further up the street (and a bunch of French flags): Bridge Street, Sydney, 1901 [NLA: nla.pic-an13148760-s25]
